Pre-Game Insights: The Washington Nationals' DJ Herz is the starting pitcher, while Javier Assad for the Chicago Cubs is projected to start.
Javier Assad has a 3.15 ERA and a 1.34 WHIP, while DJ Herz has a 3.84 ERA and a 1.28 WHIP.
The Cubs are expected to have a stronger offensive lineup with key players like Ian Happ, Seiya Suzuki, and Cody Bellinger.
The Nationals' CJ Abrams, Luis Garcia Jr., and Keibert Ruiz are highlighted as their top performers.
